title: Vel'Koz Arclight skin bug discovered
body:
{{champion:161}} I really love Vel'Koz's Arclight skin, but recently I have discovered that a lot of bugs are happening. He can literally turn into a star, like all hands become straight, after throwing his Q, and sometimes his mode will unable to move after an auto attack, until next auto attack, ability or other movements.  Plz try to fix this bug, it is not affecting anything, but it is kind of annoying. Thx! Riot coders.!
Client version : 5.23.15_11_19_13_15
Any game I played with Vrl'Koz recently are with arc light skin.

replies.body: its on all skins. I asked a rioter a direct question about this. no response yet. ill keep you gents posted.

Hey Luotn,

Thank you for the report!  This bug affects all skins and base Vel'Koz. We're currently aware of this issue and are investigating.
maybe you can suggest that you disable vel'koz? because this is practically unplayable :C
At this time, I don't believe we're going to disable him. This isn't affecting the gameplay aspect of the champ, but rather the animation set.

I have to say that it is really funny to see my champion being like a star in game, and I kind of want to see that again, do you think it is a good idea to add this "star mode" into his joke?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I also noticed that sometimes when you respawn at base, he will sometimes  have to complete an entire idle animation  before his  moving animation will take effect,
Yeah, but i think it is kind of funny to see it and share with my teammates and opponents.
